member.name: T:LaPakguette.Lib.PakHandler
member.summary: Handler for BNS UE4 .pak files wrapping UnrealPak

member.name: M:LaPakguette.Lib.PakHandler.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Handler for BNS UE4 .pak files wrapping UnrealPak

member.name: M:LaPakguette.Lib.PakHandler.Unpack(System.String,System.String)
member.param:
Custom unpack directory
(Default next to .pak file)

member.name: M:LaPakguette.Lib.PakHandler.Create(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Create a .pak file from a repack folder
A repack.txt must exist in the folder.
member.param: Repack folder with pak content and repack.txt file.

Custom output path of .pak file
(Default next to repack folder)

member.name: M:LaPakguette.Lib.PakHandler.Repack(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Repack a .pak file from the default unpack folder.
